sqlMap.select:
SELECT FROM FAI_ORDER_INFO_V2_BACK_TEST WHERE 1=1 AND FAI_ORDER_INFO_V2_BACK_TEST.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ORDER_ID) =#order_id#
(TRANS_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#trans_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TER_ID) Like '%'||(#trans_ter_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CHANNEL_TYPE) Like '%'||(#channel_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_AMT) =#trans_amt#
(TRANS_CUR) Like '%'||(#trans_cur:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TIME) Like '%'||(#trans_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_STATUS) Like '%'||(#trans_status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#trans_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RES_CODE) Like '%'||(#res_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RES_DESC) Like '%'||(#res_desc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_QID) Like '%'||(#trans_qid:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TRACE_NUMBER) Like '%'||(#trans_trace_number:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TRACE_TIME) Like '%'||(#trans_trace_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_DATE) Like '%'||(#settle_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_AMT) =#settle_amt#
(SETTLE_CUR) Like '%'||(#settle_cur:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_CONVER_RATE) Like '%'||(#settle_conver_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MOBILE) Like '%'||(#mobile:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ID_TYPE) Like '%'||(#id_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ID_NO) Like '%'||(#id_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(USER_NAME) Like '%'||(#user_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BIND_NUM) Like '%'||(#bind_num:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PAN) Like '%'||(#pan:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_TYPE) Like '%'||(#card_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ISSBANK_ID) Like '%'||(#issbank_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ISSBANK_NAME) Like '%'||(#issbank_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CH_INFO) Like '%'||(#ch_info:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT1) Like '%'||(#account1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT2) Like '%'||(#account2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORG_ORDER_ID) =#org_order_id#
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MODIFY_TIME) Like '%'||(#modify_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(EXT) Like '%'||(#ext:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CSN) Like '%'||(#csn:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_MER_NAME) Like '%'||(#trans_mer_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SPID) Like '%'||(#spid:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_ID) Like '%'||(#card_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUB_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_ID) Like '%'||(#mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM FAI_ORDER_INFO_V2_BACK_TEST WHERE 1=1 AND FAI_ORDER_INFO_V2_BACK_TEST.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ORDER_ID) =#order_id#

(SETTLE_DATE) Like '%'||(#settle_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_AMT) =#settle_amt#

(CARD_ID) Like '%'||(#card_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
